entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
